import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' function LoginForm(props) { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [redirect, setRedirect] = useState(false) const [role, setRole] = useState('') const submit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API + 'authmanagement/login', { method: 'POST', headers: { Accept: 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, credentials: 'include', body: JSON.stringify({ email, password, }), }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then( (result) => { fetch( process.env.REACT_APP_API + 'setup/GetUserRoles?email=' + email, { headers: { Accept: '*/*', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', }, credentials: 'include', }, ) .then((response) => response.text()) .then((data) => { data = data.splice(0, 2); data = data.splice(da.length-2, 2); }); setRedirect(true) props.setName(result.username) }, (error) => { alert('Failed') }, ) } if (redirect && role) { console.log('user role:: ' + role) return } return (
